DataElement.preferredName: Patient Hearing Loss Dose Modification Criterion Yes No Not Evaluable Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no/not evaluable response to whether or not patietn's hearing decrease met dose modification criteria.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Hearing Loss Dose Modification Criterion
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._A partial or complete loss of hearing in one or both ears. It is classified as conductive, sensory, or central._Change, alteration, or adjustment of a dose specified in a treatment plan or/and administered to a patient._That which constitutes a standard from which a judgment can be established, a reference point against which other things can be evaluated, or a basis for comparison.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: A partial or complete loss of hearing in one or both ears. It is classified as conductive, sensory, or central.:Change, alteration, or adjustment of a dose specified in a treatment plan or/and administered to a patient.:That which constitutes a standard from which a judgment can be established, a reference point against which other things can be evaluated, or a basis for comparison.

Concepts.definition: A partial or complete loss of hearing in one or both ears. It is classified as conductive, sensory, or central.
Change, alteration, or adjustment of a dose specified in a treatment plan or/and administered to a patient.
That which constitutes a standard from which a judgment can be established, a reference point against which other things can be evaluated, or a basis for comparison.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/not evaluable.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
